org.jogger.config.spring
Class SpringInterceptors

java.lang.Object
  org.jogger.config.Interceptors
      org.jogger.config.spring.SpringInterceptors

public abstract class SpringInterceptors
extends Interceptors

This is Interceptors implementation that exposes the add(String, String...) method that allows subclasses to add declared beans as interceptors.

Author:
German Escobar

Constructor Summary
SpringInterceptors()
           
 
Method Summary
 void add(String beanName, String... paths)
          Retrieves an interceptor from the Spring ApplicationContext and delegates the call to the Interceptors.add(Interceptor, String...) method.
abstract  void initialize()
          This method is implemented by concrete SpringInterceptor classes calling the add(String, String...) method to add interceptors.

Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize(javax.servlet.ServletConfig servletConfig)
Specified by:
initialize in class Interceptors

add

public void add(String beanName,
                String... paths)
Retrieves an interceptor from the Spring ApplicationContext and delegates the call to the Interceptors.add(Interceptor, String...) method.

Parameters:
beanName - the name of the Spring bean that extends Interceptor.
paths - the paths to which this interceptor applies.

initialize

public abstract void initialize()
This method is implemented by concrete SpringInterceptor classes calling the add(String, String...) method to add interceptors.

setApplicationContext

public void setApplicationContext(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext applicationContext)
